thread.title: Vols looking to snap losing streak against Alabama in Tuscaloosa
thread.title_full: Vols looking to snap losing streak against Alabama in Tuscaloosa

title: Vols looking to snap losing streak against Alabama in Tuscaloosa
text:
Vols looking to snap losing streak against Alabama in Tuscaloosa Vols looking to snap losing streak against Alabama in Tuscaloosa Post to Facebook Vols looking to snap losing streak against Alabama in Tuscaloosa Vols looking to snap losing streak against Alabama in Tuscaloosa  //on.wbir.com/1LUgMtm   1   Vols looking to snap losing streak against Alabama in Tuscaloosa The Tennessee Volunteers arrive at Alabama's Bryant-Denny Stadium on Saturday, Oct. 24, 2015 WBIR Zachary Sewell, 2:52 p.m. EDT October 24, 2015 Vols take on Alabama 1 CONNECT 7 TWEET LINKEDIN 1 COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
(WBIR-Knoxville) "The Third Saturday in October" has arrived. Tennessee takes on Alabama in Tuscaloosa at 3:30 Saturday. 
The Vols have not beaten the Tide since 2006, but don't let that fool you. Despite recent struggles, Tennessee has been within a few possessions of taking down Alabama. The Vols have lost eight straight to Alabama, which is the second longest winless streak in series history. 
Tennessee is coming into Saturdays game with a big win against Georgia. They have also had two weeks to prepare for the strong Alabama defense. Big orange will have to rely on the running ability of Josh Dobbs and an up tempo type offense if they have any hopes of beating Alabama.
